description:
At Buckeye Better Business, we specialize in helping businesses thrive and achieve their growth goals. With our expertise in outsourced sales, consulting, and account acquisition, we are the trusted partner for companies seeking to expand their customer base and gain a competitive edge.

We have been in business for over 11 years. We have multiple locations. We are an award winning company.

We have a proven system. We will have 30 new locations in the next 2 years.

Join Us:
• Rapid advancement opportunities
• Fast-track advancement opportunities into a management position, based on performance.
• We only promote from within
• Merit based promotions
• Mentorship from industry leaders in sales and team development
• Comprehensive training and ongoing professional development to enhance your sales and leadership skills.
• Personal and professional development
• We invest in our people
• We know as they grow the organization grow and our clients succeed
• Competitive work environment - We like to win or hate to lose!
• Exciting work environment surrounded by motivated individuals, fostering a supportive and collaborative culture.
• Competitive pay with uncapped commission structure, rewarding your sales achievements.
• Company discounts

Candidates in our organization eventually master these skills:
• Conduct sales presentations and product demonstrations to potential clients.
• Meet and exceed monthly sales targets and key performance indicators (KPIs).
• Collaborate with the sales team to strategize and execute effective sales techniques.
• Stay up-to-date with industry trends, competitive landscape, and customer needs to identify new business opportunities.
• Prepare accurate sales reports and maintain detailed records of sales activities.
• Proficiency in using sales software and CRM systems.

Candidates who excel possess these characteristics:
• Competitive mindset, driving you to exceed sales targets and achieve personal and professional growth.
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to confidently engage with clients.
• Proven track record of meeting or exceeding goals.
• Tenacity
• Work Ethic
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team, adapting to changing priorities and a dynamic environment.
• Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field is preferred but not mandatory.

If you are a driven, and think you would thrive in a competitive sales environment with opportunity to advance into management position. Please apply. We have been waiting for you.
